caption: File
name: file
description: The File object represents the metadata associated with a file stored in a computer system. It encompasses information about the file itself, including its attributes, properties, and organizational details.

created_time.description: The time when the file was created.

creator.description: The user that created the file.

desc.description: The description of the file, as returned by file system. For example: the description as returned by the Unix file command or the Windows file type.

encryption_details.description: The encryption details of the file. Should be populated if the file is encrypted.

ext.caption: File Extension
ext.description: The extension of the file, excluding the leading dot. For example: exe from svchost.exe, or gz from export.tar.gz.

is_deleted.description: Indicates if the file was deleted from the filesystem.

is_encrypted.description: Indicates if the file is encrypted.

is_public.description: Indicates if the file is publicly accessible. For example in an object's public access in AWS S3

modified_time.description: The time when the file was last modified.

modifier.description: The user that last modified the file.

name.description: The name of the file. For example: svchost.exe

path.description: The full path to the file. For example: c:\windows\system32\svchost.exe.

product.description: The product that created or installed the file.

storage_class.description: The storage class of the file. For example in AWS S3: STANDARD, STANDARD_IA, GLACIER.

tags.description: The list of tags; {key:value} pairs associated to the file.

uid.description: The unique identifier of the file as defined by the storage system, such the file system file ID.
